duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Selling/Customer Service activities, including greeting and acknowledging all customers, handling merchandise, providing information, assistance, and direction to customers.
Support a strong commitment to world-class customer service and ensure a pleasant and productive shopping experience for all customers.
Demonstrate products to customers and replenish products on shelves as per Merchandising guidelines.
